Kerry Lee bụ onye na-agụ egwu nke Afrikaans nke nwere ụda Modern Country.
A mụrụ Lee n'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1989 na Durban
E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya "Vou Jou Arms Om My" nke Anton Botha dekọrọ n'afọ 2010.
N'afọ 2009, ọ gụrụ egwu nke isiokwu gbasara "Love & Mortar" na DSTV channel 182, nke egwu isiokwu ya bụ "Street Rods Africa" n'afọ 2010 sochiri.
N'afọ 2012, Lee wepụtara egwu ọhụrụ "Met Ringe en Woorde"
Egwu a kporo ọkụ na ụlọ ọrụ redio na South Africa.
N'afọ 2013, Lee na Hugo Ludik, onye guzobere otu South Africa ADAM na onye nduzi nke Muse Productions, wepụtara egwu abụọ bụ "Shut Up en Soen My" & "Kaalvoet Boerseun".
Lee na ndị na-ede egwu Vaughn Gardiner na Roux Cloete wepụtara abọm "Dans in die Reën".
A họpụtara Lee maka Ghoema Music Awards abụọ n'afọ 2017: Best Country Album, na Publi'cs Favourite Female Artist.
